job_details.Functieomschrijving:
As a Lead Pega DevOps Engineer in our organisation, you will spearhead our FEC initiatives, driving the design and implementation of Pega-based solutions. You will have the unique opportunity to make a significant impact on our systems and processes. You will lead and collaborate closely with cross-functional teams, including business stakeholders and developers, to deliver state-of-the-art systems that enhance operational efficiency and ensure regulatory compliance. Your responsibilities will include among others:
          + Leading end-to-end Pega project implementations, including solution design, system configuration, and integration.
          + Translating business requirements into scalable and robust Pega-based solutions.
          + Collaborating with stakeholders to gather functional and technical requirements, ensuring alignment with project objectives.
          + Mentoring and guiding (a) team(s) of skilled Pega developers, fostering a culture of innovation, and promoting professional growth.
          + Conducting thorough system testing, identifying and resolving issues to ensure optimal performance and reliability.
          + Stay abreast of industry trends, emerging technologies, and Pega platform updates, bringing innovative ideas to the table.
job_details.full_text:
Lead Pega Devops Engineer

As a Lead Pega DevOps Engineer in our organisation, you will spearhead our FEC initiatives, driving the design and implementation of Pega-based solutions. You will have the unique opportunity to make a significant impact on our systems and processes. You will lead and collaborate closely with cross-functional teams, including business stakeholders and developers, to deliver state-of-the-art systems that enhance operational efficiency and ensure regulatory compliance. Your responsibilities will include among others:
          + Leading end-to-end Pega project implementations, including solution design, system configuration, and integration.
          + Translating business requirements into scalable and robust Pega-based solutions.
          + Collaborating with stakeholders to gather functional and technical requirements, ensuring alignment with project objectives.
          + Mentoring and guiding (a) team(s) of skilled Pega developers, fostering a culture of innovation, and promoting professional growth.
          + Conducting thorough system testing, identifying and resolving issues to ensure optimal performance and reliability.
          + Stay abreast of industry trends, emerging technologies, and Pega platform updates, bringing innovative ideas to the table.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on Pega development and DevOps practices within that specific platform. While it mentions 'emerging technologies' and 'innovative ideas', it does not specify any Generative AI or core Machine Learning technologies, models, or frameworks. The core responsibilities revolve around Pega system implementation, configuration, integration, and maintenance, which falls outside the scope of ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer profiles as defined in the coding book. It is primarily a Pega-focused DevOps role.

job_tasks.justification: The role requires translating business requirements into technical solutions and collaborating with stakeholders to gather functional and technical requirements, ensuring alignment with project objectives.

job_tasks.justification: The title 'Lead Pega DevOps Engineer' directly indicates a focus on DevOps practices within the Pega ecosystem. This includes ensuring optimal performance and reliability through testing and issue resolution.
Conducting thorough system testing and resolving issues are key aspects of ensuring the operational stability and reliability of a system.
job_tasks.phrase: Conducting thorough system testing, identifying and resolving issues to ensure optimal performance and reliability.
